page.title: 03ORCHIDS
page.content: Some orchids are very rare.There are thirty different kinds of orchid.These are some of them.Fragrant Orchid, Broad-leaved Marsh Orchid,Early Purple Orchid and Green-winged Orchid.It takes them ten to eleven years to grow.The Fragrant Orchid is very rare. The Early Purple Orchid is very common.Marram grass grows in are sand-dunes.Its iong strong roots, sometimes 20 feet long,helpto hold down the drifting sands.When the Marram grass has made a firmer soil the grass disappears.Its leaves are curled round to hold the moisture.Scurvy grass grows at the edge of the sand-dunes.Its name coming from time when sailors used it to prevent scurvy.
